title: WAISTCOAT WITH T-SHIRTS & UNBUTTONED SHIRTS
description: Men should play around with shirting, styling the look formally or giving it a more relaxed feel, depending...
descriptionDetail: Men should play around with shirting, styling the look formally or giving it a more relaxed feel, depending on the shirt. It’s all about creating a more relaxed feel, compared to wearing a three-piece suit. But, at the same time ensure the outfit still has a certain formality to it. And don’t be tempted to rock it with a singlet; too much arm skin, not enough discretion.
Try wearing it with a t-shirt, short sleeve shirt or a long sleeve shirt with the sleeves rolled up.
Hit the gallery for 30 ways to rock a suit vest both with and without a suit.

title: A STATEMENT OF STYLE: THE WOMEN’S VELEDA
description: Men should play around with shirting, styling the look formally or giving it a more relaxed feel, depending...
descriptionDetail: Few things are as chic than the stunning midnight blue one-button tuxedo jacket in Italian wool crepe, accentuated by a deep black shawl lapel and center back vent. The Black Watch tartan velvet tuxedo is as understated as it is unique and brings a sense of festive yet elegant flair.

For the black-tie occasion: A clean, white French cuff is the height of classic, and a sequined lace camisole pairs well with a glass of champagne. When borrowing from the boys’ department, the largest tuxedo shirt serves as a style statement too. Smoking slippers or velvet heels complete the look that will likely be the most compelling in the room––all because of the woman who wears it.

title: CO-ORDINATING BUSINESS SUITS FOR BOTH MEN & WOMEN
description: Vedela is rapidly becoming the label of first choice for business & organisations that operate across a range of latitudes. The fabric innovation with cool...
descriptionDetail: Vedela is rapidly becoming the label of first choice for business & organisations that operate across a range of latitudes. The fabric innovation with cool stretch plain & pinstripe options is suited to an entire range of climates.

Using the latest fabric technology to blend bamboo with polyester in both plain & pinstripe patterns as well as blending polyester with wool & elastane to form wool stretch in plain pattern fabrics has given Vedela an edge in the business suiting market.
Teamed with the Vedela range of business shirting and separates, trousers, skirts, dresses & knits the Vedela labels offer a complete corporate uniform solution.
All Vedela Women’s Suits & Jackets include FREE logo embroidery.

title: HOW TO OWN YOUR SMART OFFICE STYLE
description: Focus On Fit The golden rule, in every tailored sense of men’s style, is purchase clothing that fits...
descriptionDetail: The golden rule, in every tailored sense of men’s style, is purchase clothing that fits you properly. Nothing destroys an outfit – whatever the dress code and no matter how expensive the clothes are – like an ill-fitting jacket, shirt or trouser.
The first secret to looking smart is sizing correctly. Shoulders, waist and arm length.

title: CORPORATE & PROFESSIONAL READY TO WEARS
description: We just can't take out our eyes off this look as it's just perfect from head to toe. We've...
descriptionDetail: We just can't take out our eyes off this look as it's just perfect from head to toe. We've mastered the details, so you can feel confident to master life's challenges. If you're a fan of experimenting with fashion then this outfit is exactly what you need to go for. Wear it with confidence to create an impression! We custom-make each garment to your unique measurements and specifications.  This look is mostly for the people who work, at corporate offices with top-notch meetings happening every weekend.
